subject: Hey usb handbrake
description_text:
Do you sell the control box for usb handbrake mine is broken doesnt get
recongised by pc anymore.

conversations.body_text: Hi Immanuel Podesta,  Please download FreeJoy and take a screenshot of the interface for us to check. I will determine whether it’s a software configuration issue or a hardware problem. If it’s a configuration issue, it can be restored.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

its working now thanks so that means it was a software error?/

On Thu, Dec 25, 2025 at 1:54 PM support@simsonn.com

Its working but iam not able to calibrate it. So its at half strenght

On Fri, 26 Dec 2025, 1:02 pm Immanuel Podesta, <immanuelpodesta@gmail.com>
wrote:

> its working now thanks so that means it was a software error?/
>
> On Thu, Dec 25, 2025 at 1:54 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Immanuel Podesta,  You need to use Freejoy 1.7.0, not 1.7.1.            https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

Opened the one u sent still cant config full use of handbrake .

Thats with handbrake at full

I recalibrated and loaded the hb file you sent . Still the same

On Mon, 29 Dec 2025, 1:53 am support@simsonn.com,

On Mon, 29 Dec 2025, 6:54 pm Immanuel Podesta, <immanuelpodesta@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Opened the one u sent still cant config full use of handbrake .
>
> Thats with handbrake at full
>
> I recalibrated and loaded the hb file you sent . Still the same
>
> On Mon, 29 Dec 2025, 1:53 am support@simsonn.com, 
Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Hi Immanuel Podesta,     After opening Freejoy 1.7.0, click Read Config from Device once to configure the handbrake.

Still the same

On Tue, 30 Dec 2025, 7:27 pm support@simsonn.com,

I reset everything and did all stels again what you told me to do and now
its even less power

On Tue, 30 Dec 2025, 7:27 pm support@simsonn.com,

Hi Immanuel Podesta,     You only need to calibrate once: click Read Config from Device, then Axis, and then the Calibrate button. Pull the handbrake a few times with normal force, click Stop Calibration, and finally click Write Config to Device. After that, test whether the blue progress bar reaches 100%. If it does, the calibration is successful.

Thanks so much its working now .

On Tue, 30 Dec 2025, 8:25 pm support@simsonn.com,
